titles.title: We stand amazed in the presence (altered version of “I Stand Amazed in the Presence”)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We stand amazed in the presence Of Jesus the Nazarene, And praise Him that He could love us, All sinners, condemned unclean!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How wonderful! How marvelous! And our song shall ever be, How excellent! How glorious! Christ is life in you and me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We’ve seen His love in the brethren Expressing the unity That’s only found in the Spirit Who is dwelling in you and me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How wonderful! How marvelous! And our song shall ever be, How excellent! How glorious! Christ is life in you and me.{/lang-eng}
